Source.Name: icon-naming-utils
Source.Description: The icon-naming-utils package contains a script used for maintaining backwards compatibility with current desktop icon themes, while migrating to the names specified in the Icon Naming Specification.

Package.Name: icon-naming-utils
Package.Description: The icon-naming-utils package contains a script used for maintaining backwards compatibility with current desktop icon themes, while migrating to the names specified in the Icon Naming Specification.
